mesos/master.description: The URL of the Mesos master. The format is a comma-delimited list of hosts like zk://host1:port,host2:port/mesos. If using ZooKeeper, pay particular attention to the leading zk:// and trailing /mesos! If not using ZooKeeper, standard URLs like http://localhost are also acceptable.

arangodb/zk.description: ZooKeeper URL for storing state. Format: zk://host1:port1,host2:port2,.../path. Please note that the id is appended to the path.

arangodb/webui-host.description: For debugging: use this host for WEBUI request.

arangodb/framework-port.description: Framework port, use '0' to let Mesos select a port for you.

arangodb/volume-path.description: Path for persistent data (until persistent volumes are available).

arangodb/minimal-resources-agent.description: Minimal mesos resources for an agent

arangodb/minimal-resources-coordinator.description: Minimal mesos resources for a coordinator

arangodb/minimal-resources-dbserver.description: Minimal mesos resources for a DBserver
